title: PSA2 Mk 1907-09 H.M. Taylor Detroit Club Postcard
author: Cards2121

posts.post_title: PSA2 Mk 1907-09 H.M. Taylor Detroit Club Postcard
posts.post_content: Selling a PSA 2 MK 1907-09 H.M Taylor Detroit Club Postcard with a very young Ty Cobb. Card has some wear and the original owner wrote each players initials over their picture. The reverse has an address listed but has not been mailed. Asking $600 delivered OBO. Thanks!
